00019     AtcHandler
00020     ======================================================================== */
00023 class AtcHandler : public BaseHandler {
00024     typedef BaseHandler Base;
00025 
00026     public:
00027 
00028         enum { ID = AtcHandlerId };
00029 
00031         AtcHandler();
00033         virtual ~AtcHandler();
00034 
00036         virtual HandlerId GetHandlerId() const;
00037 
00039         void SetPbAlphaTagRequestBehaviour(PbRequestBehaviour behaviour) {
00040             m_atc_dispatcher.SetPbAlphaTagRequestBehaviour(behaviour);
00041         }
00045         BOOLEAN ConfirmPbAlphaTagRequest(
00046             const WString & alphatag, const PhoneNumber & phno, BOOLEAN apoxilookup = FALSE)
00047         {
00048             return m_atc_dispatcher.ConfirmPbAlphaTagRequest(alphatag,phno, apoxilookup);
00049         }
00050 
00053         void SetPbRecordRequestBehaviour(BOOLEAN mmicontrolled) {
00054             m_atc_dispatcher.SetPbRecordRequestBehaviour(mmicontrolled);
00055         }
00056 
00059         BOOLEAN CommitPbInformation(const MePhonebookDescription & description)
00060         {
00061             return m_atc_dispatcher.CommitPbInformation(description);
00062         }
00063 
00066         BOOLEAN ConfirmPbSizeRequest(
00067             BOOLEAN capable,         // MMI has to set the value to TRUE if it is capable of detecting the size.
00068             MePhoneBookType type,    // the requested phonebook type as used in PbSizeRequestMsg
00069             INT usedrecords,         // used records inside the phonebook
00070             INT totalrecords = 0)    // obsolete parameter, as this is sent with CommitPbInformation
00071         {
00072             return m_atc_dispatcher.ConfirmPbSizeRequest(capable,type,usedrecords);
00073         }
00074 
00077         BOOLEAN ConfirmPbEntryRequest(
00078             BOOLEAN capable,                    // MMI has to set the value to TRUE if it was capable of returning the entry correctly.
00079             MePhoneBookType type,               // the requested phonebook type as used in PbSizeRequestMsg
00080             INT recordnumber,                   // the record number requested by the AT via the message PbEntryRequestMsg
00081             const WString & alphaidentifier,    // it can be also be an empty string 
00082             const PhoneNumber & phno)           // it can also be an empty phonenumber
00083         {
00084             return m_atc_dispatcher.ConfirmPbEntryRequest(capable,type,recordnumber,alphaidentifier,phno);
00085         }
00086 
00087 
00088     private:
00089         AtcDispatcher m_atc_dispatcher;     // main dispatcher for retrieving asynchronous messages
00090 
00091 };
